title: The Lean Startup by Eric Ries
description: A methodology for developing businesses and products that aims to shorten product development cycles and rapidly discover if a proposed business model is viable.

title: Atomic Habits by James Clear
description: A comprehensive guide on building good habits and breaking bad ones, with practical strategies for behavior change.

title: Deep Work by Cal Newport
description: Rules for focused success in a distracted world, emphasizing the importance of deep, concentrated work.

title: Coursera - Machine Learning Course by Andrew Ng
description: Comprehensive introduction to machine learning, covering supervised learning, unsupervised learning, and best practices.

title: FreeCodeCamp Full Stack Development
description: Free comprehensive curriculum covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and databases.

title: The Pragmatic Programmer by David Thomas
description: A practical guide to software development with tips and techniques for becoming a more effective programmer.

title: System Design Interview by Alex Xu
description: Comprehensive guide to system design interviews with real-world examples and scalable architecture patterns.

title: Harvard CS50 - Introduction to Computer Science
description: Harvard's introductory computer science course covering programming fundamentals and computer science concepts.

title: The Manager's Path by Camille Fournier
description: A practical guide for engineering managers, covering the transition from individual contributor to leadership roles.

title: Designing Data-Intensive Applications by Martin Kleppmann
description: Comprehensive guide to building reliable, scalable, and maintainable data-intensive applications.

title: Cracking the Coding Interview by Gayle McDowell
description: Comprehensive guide to technical interviews with coding problems, solutions, and interview strategies.

title: AWS Certified Solutions Architect
description: Amazon's certification for designing distributed systems on AWS platform.

title: Clean Code by Robert Martin
description: A handbook of agile software craftsmanship with principles for writing clean, maintainable code.

title: The Art of Computer Programming by Donald Knuth
description: Comprehensive series on computer programming algorithms and mathematical foundations.

title: React Documentation
description: Official React documentation with tutorials, guides, and API reference.

title: Python for Data Science Handbook by Jake VanderPlas
description: Comprehensive guide to using Python for data analysis, visualization, and machine learning.

title: The Phoenix Project by Gene Kim
description: A novel about IT, DevOps, and helping your business win through the lens of a fictional company's transformation.

title: Kubernetes Documentation
description: Official Kubernetes documentation for container orchestration and management.

title: The Mythical Man-Month by Frederick Brooks
description: Classic essays on software engineering and project management, including the famous 'Brooks's Law'.

title: Google Cloud Platform Fundamentals
description: Google's course covering GCP services, architecture, and best practices for cloud computing.

title: The DevOps Handbook by Gene Kim
description: Practical guide to implementing DevOps practices and creating a culture of continuous delivery.

title: Eloquent JavaScript by Marijn Haverbeke
description: A modern introduction to programming using JavaScript, available free online.

title: High Performance Browser Networking by Ilya Grigorik
description: Comprehensive guide to web performance optimization and network protocols.

title: The Effective Engineer by Edmond Lau
description: Practical advice for software engineers on how to maximize their impact and career growth.

title: Docker Documentation
description: Official Docker documentation for containerization and container orchestration.
